subject: Beginner Going to attempt to make his first box.
author: afterdarkdigital
full_text:
Hello all,

Thanks for having me apart of your yahoo group.  Ive been researching this a lot and was overly excited to find a group that actually has frank posting in it.

I'm about to attempt to make my first box ( well i have made the ufogeek radio shack hack, but that was too easy).  I plan to try and make the one with a random voltage generator that's plugged into the Radio Shack 499, and if I can do that successfully, out to an echo-box before heading out.

My question to you all is if you could point me in the right direction to get up to speed enough on circuits and electronics via a website or book.  I have no experience doing this kind of stuff.  But im a quick learner and really want to make this happen.

Thanks for the help everyone,

God Bless and Good Results to you all.

David
